original_text: But put forth thine hand now, and touch his bone and his flesh, and he will curse thee to thy face.
korean_text: 이제 주의 손을 펴서 그의 뼈와 살을 치소서 그리하시면 틀림없이 주를 향하여 욕하지 않겠나이까

sentences.original_text: But put forth thine hand now
and touch his bone and his flesh
and he will curse thee to thy face
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그는 당신 얼굴을 보고 당신을 저주할 것입니다
